name: Rocketing
description:
Rocketing is a 1vs1 Battle Game.

What's special? It is one of the Rare 2 Player 1 Console Games!!

You and your Friends Job is it to get the other one Down by Hurling Stones at them and their Platform! You can lose by either get hit by a Rock or Falling Down.

Simple Right?

So go now, Play it and Have Fun!
